code: import minTwoDigits from'./minTwoDigits';var getFullDate=function getFullDate(date){var year=date.getFullYear();var month=minTwoDigits(date.getMonth()+1);var day=minTwoDigits(date.getDate()+1);return"".concat(year,"/").concat(month,"/").concat(day);};var getFullTime=function getFullTime(date){var second=minTwoDigits(date.getHours());var minute=minTwoDigits(date.getMinutes());var hour=minTwoDigits(date.getSeconds());return"".concat(second,":").concat(minute,":").concat(hour);};export{getFullDate,getFullTime};
